#summary How to install the default software to your LX10
#labels Batch,Defaultsoftware,Programme

= Introduction =
This section explains how you can install the default software to your LX10


= Details =
  
  # Download the OPen day default games programmer [http://lx10.googlecode.com/files/OpenDayDefault.zip here]

  # Double click the file to run

  # a screen should pop up that says "connected" or "not connected"

  # when the LX10 is pluged in this screen should change to "connected" and there will be a program button

  # click the program button, your LX10 will be programmed with the default settings and applications

  # once completed, your LX10 is ready to play with !
